Add google form

Source: R/cq_add_form.R
cq_add_form.Rd

Adds a google form in an iframe to a quarto document. A wrapper for knitr::include_url() with differnt defaults.

Usage

cq_add_form(form_url, height = "600px")

Arguments

form_url

URL of google form

height

height of iframe.

Value

An R object that knitr recognizes to generate the iframe.

Examples

cq_add_form(
  form_url = "https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSclFEEt2PIQhnr-laqmtSk1CTGSyv43VaroA05G978_ammHIg/viewform?embedded=true"
)
#> $url
#> [1] "https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSclFEEt2PIQhnr-laqmtSk1CTGSyv43VaroA05G978_ammHIg/viewform?embedded=true"
#> 
#> $height
#> [1] "600px"
#> 
#> $url.orig
#> [1] "https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSclFEEt2PIQhnr-laqmtSk1CTGSyv43VaroA05G978_ammHIg/viewform?embedded=true"
#> 
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "knit_embed_url" "knit_asis_url"
